author: Special Correspondent
text:
City Police are probing into a complaint of cheating preferred by a patient against a nurse of a city hospital.

According to police, Sivakumar (33) of Nanjundapuram Road involved in copper trade was a regular visitor to a hospital in Pappanaickenpalayam area for a kidney stone related ailment.

It is learnt that a nurse there Benzy (25), from Kanyakumari area, had reportedly promised to marry Sivakumar provided he helped in her construction of a house at the native place and also in making her brother pursue education.

Accordingly, Sivakumar claimed that he provided Rs. 11 lakh and alleged that Benzy was backing out from the assured marriage citing the difference in religion and the resultant opposition from her parents. Based on the complaint, police have launched a probe against Benzy and her three relatives.
title: Probe on into cheating complaint
